verses.name: Deuteronomy 29:14
verses.text: Neither with you only do I make this covenant and this oath;

verses.name: Deuteronomy 29:15
verses.text: But with him that standeth here with us this day before the Lord our God, and also with him that is not here with us this day:

verses.name: Deuteronomy 29:16
verses.text: (For ye know how we have dwelt in the land of Egypt; and how we came through the nations which ye passed by;

verses.name: Deuteronomy 29:17
verses.text: And ye have seen their abominations, and their idols, wood and stone, silver and gold, which were among them:)
